content.detailedDescription:
I wanted to share this video with you because i can't exactly explain what happened.
my fianc�� and i live in tustin, near the 55 freeway and directly under the approach path to john wayne regional airport. as an army aviation veteran i'm right at home around air traffic and often look up to see the passing craft. we had just returned from visiting friends and as we got out of the car we saw a light that didn't look like any other aircraft i'm familiar with. we have each taken a video of the event, shooting from to different parts of the parking lot simultaneously.
the craft appeared as four lights in a row, three blinking to a pattern and one remaining solid. it seemed to hover in the same place for the first ten minutes that we stood there watching it. then it began to descend slowly. it made a slow but distinct right angled turn towards the north and seemed to head away from us towards the west. as i mentioned this observation out loud it seemed to form into one solid light and double back directly towards us. it then put on a light display, splitting into multiple smaller points of light, always in a row, and then back to a single bright light.

we have never experienced anything like this before. i tried to get as much reference as was possible. i caught it in frame with the moon, i caught the top of the car ports, and (though it's dark) i even managed to catch power lines and lamp posts. the sounds of airplanes and helicopters can be heard passing over our heads, but this craft made no noise at all.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Coming home from visiting some friends across town we noticed a strange light in the sky. i can't explain, i can only share the experience.

content.detailedDescription: Me, my brother, sister, and friend saw 2 bright orange, reddish orbs that flew next to each other then they stopped and hovered.  then a smaller orb ejected from one of the craft floated around it for about a minute. then it rejoined the craft and then both craft blinked out. this took place above my neighborhood in hearthstone. i was with my brother and sister who saw it and shortly after the incident my friend, who lives on the other side of the neighborhood pulled up and asked if i saw the ufo's. he saw the whole thing from a different  vantage point. my friends have seen similar events in the area for years and told me to report this event right away which happened not 15 minutes ago.
content.summary: 2 bright orange, reddish orbs flew in a straight path next to each other. one ejected a smaller orb that rejoined it then both craft blinked out.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
i am not 100% on the date, but it was a warm summer night in 2009.  me and a friend were driving down a country road during the night. i was the passenger, him being the driver. it was a clear night sky, no clouds what so ever. i looked up and noticed a glowing orange light in the sky, couldn't have been more than a mile or two out from us. i pointed it out to my friend and he stopped the car and we watched as it moved slowly to the right. then we noticed a flashing red/blue light that was a helicopter coming up from the left. the object kept getting brighter and brighter to the point where you barely look at, almost the way you cant look at the sun. the object then dimmed back down. the whole time it was still moving slowly. another helicopter came up from the right and they both seemed to follow the object. we watched as the object kept moving and it dimmed down to the point where it almost looked like it went out. the object was also larger than helicopters. we continued watching until the object and the helicopters went out of view. 
   i have always been into the ufo phenomenon, so this sighting was amazing to me. something i will never forget.
content.summary: Big, bright light followed by helicopters

content.detailedDescription: I was on a mountain taking a picture of the sunset.It was glowing so bright. a plane but then lke five mins later it was still there.Well it was big long and hovering.I was shockedit just went away so fast.
content.summary: Big scary red eys

content.detailedDescription:
I live next to danbury airport, and i was sitting on my porch sky watching, trying the ���robert bingham - stephen greer/ ce5��� method of initiating contact with an et vehicle.  after maybe 10 minutes of sky watching (and i am an aviator, so i know aircraft types), i see a small white orb high in the sky, but i initially think it's a commercial jet at around 35,000', because i see a lot of those.  but the object moves very slowly and there are no contrails, and the object doesn't get any bigger (perhaps barely - i did notice what appeared to be a possible division or morphing of the orb). in fact, it looked like it could have been a tiny cloud or balloon, but there was not a cloud in the sky, and a balloon would have been blown about by the light wind. this object hovered, and came to within a 1/2 mile at perhaps 3-5,000', and remained stationary for at least 5 minutes. i called to my neighbor, who also witnessed the white orb.  it slowly moved across a part of the sky above the airport, while several commercial aircraft flew about their designated routes, oblivious to its presence.  anyway, my housemate came home, and he witnessed it too, as it started to move away, slowly at first, and then we saw it shoot rapidly up towards orbit.  i can saw without a doubt that this had to be either a military recon drone (unlikely), or an et probe (or whatever kind of instrument they send when a mental ce5 contact is initiated - if that is what it was responding to).

this was my first true ufo sighting, after 40-odd years of looking! at first, i thought it was a jet, then realized it could be an orb ufo, so instead of getting anxious (as i usually would), i made a direct attempt to look at the orb and send calming thoughts of acceptance its way, as if to say "i'm glad to see you, and hope we can communicate", still feeling incredulous to the event. but as the minutes wore on and the orb just sat in the sky, i gradually accepted it as a ufo without any fear.  i invited it to land, and as if it was watching me, i waved at it and made motions for it to come on down.  as the orb slowly moved from its first hovering position, holding altitude, i tried to get a cellphone picture, but my phone-cam is crappy. as the orb took off, moving at a very rapid rate of speed - i would guesstimate on the order of 5,000 mph+, because it moved into the upper atmosphere within 2-3 seconds, heading towards orbit. it was a thrilling experience!
content.summary: Slow moving orb appears from ne; hovers for 5 minutes; tracks slowly for 5 min; rapid ascent to orbit

content.detailedDescription:
It was a beautiful clear sunny summer morning and i was on my way to a job interview (hence, how i was aware of the exact time).  while standing at the bus stop i happened to glance across the street and up in the air and noticed two orange-red spheres hovering in the sky slightly northwest to where i was standing.  they seemed to be in the distance.  my first thought was that these were balloons and i looked away.  it then occurred to me that these objects did not look or act like balloons would, i.E. they were perfectly round, textured as a soccer ball and seemed metallic as they were reflecting the sun.  i quickly glanced back and noted that there were now only one within my visibility.  the remaining orb then proceeded to silently move towards the west.  unfortunately, the bus arrived at that moment and i entered this so as not to be late for my interview. 

what i find a little shocking is that this took place in a fairly busy area, in the middle of the day with many people around, yet i am the only person to report this?  i will never forget the clarity and the reality of seeing this object -- in my own neighbourhood.

in 1975 i saw a pair of lights high in the sky at night, in winnipeg, manitoba - suddenly, one of the lights flew across the horizon in the night sky and was gone in seconds.

i have had some extremely interesting and rather shocking conversations with a friend who is a retired astrophysical engineer who worked on the space shuttle program for nasa and who currently contracts for the us gov't.
content.summary: 2orange-red orbs sighted silently hovering, 1 disappeared; 1 moved westward.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a hang glider pilot from canada and go to florida once a year to fly at an aero tow park near groveland,fla. i was coming in to land and one of my friends was videoing my approach into the field and the landing. i will send the video which will show everything. no one saw the objects as they flew at blurring speeds not visible to the naked eye. though one guy said he saw the entity but not sure if it was on the video or in person.
the friend sent me the video and i viewed it on my way back to canada at the hotel room we stayed for the night. i noticed these strange streaks shooting across behind me and infront as i was flying. they were so fast that you would hardly notice them. i check another video of my other friend coming into land just before me and saw  the orbs in the center upper right moving at great speed changing direction instantly then vanishing. first it was one then turned into two before disappearing against an over cast cloud cover. back to my landing approach right at the start of the video an orb show up in the distance behind my left wing and flys from left to right. only visible if you play pause quickly , then suddenly from the upper left of the screen an object came streaking down at about 45 deg. right infront of my hang glider as i was coming in to land. it looked liked a bird as it was a circle with two sharp wings  , then it either changed shape or angle of view so it looked more oval looking and shot down at the same angle into the forest not changing speed or direction.
then as i was in my final landing approach my feet started to touch down and the object object (same one or different one, who knows) came in from the right about 3' off the ground and again at break neck speed,(blur) about 10 deg. and don't really know where it ended up as the video did not show.
i was very excited to see this , though after the fact as this was my first ufo sighting of my life. you will see much detail once you view the video and slow it down frame by frame. i can send the other video of my friend's landing if you wish. it was just an orb in the distance changeing directions and splitting into two then vanishing.
the video was taken at 30 fps on a jvc hd video camera.
content.summary: Small ufo first came  from sky shot across infront of me while hang gliding

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog milo in the front yard, and i always started to look at the sky because ive had a couple weird sky dreams, and ive always looked out for orion constellation for fun of it.  while i was sitting down in a chair, waiting for my dog to do business, i was thinking while looking up in the sky why is this world so messed up, it needs to go back its natural state(kinda depressed at the time) and all of a sudden from my corner view of my eye, from northern part of sky, i quickly looked and "ooh shooting star!" but it wasnt it moved at straight line (going left towards west), then it went down, and up diagonally to the left again and kept going till it disappeard into the other side of the world went by orions, i was like "what kind of star moves like that?!" o.O ive also had  another sighting at night around 12 pm last year and it was some weird light that flashed in the corner of my room then it went out of my window outside in the backyard..And the thing ive noticed, whenever i feel like theres something weird about to happen, i hear a "croak-like cricket mix noise" and i tend to just be on alert and i find myself finding weird things like this..Its kinda lkke a warning i guess :p those two experiences ive had, ive always heard that noise and then latr like 5 seconds something comes up. in my two weird dreams ive heard that same unique noise. idk what it is
content.summary: Moved like a shooting star,slowed and changed directions

content.detailedDescription:
I was an airman stationed at holloman, afb in the early 1980's.  they broke the supply line down to the flight line, in order to get the parts they needed faster, and i volunteered to be the one to go.

i was assigned to the 9th amu, the flying knights, and it had the worst record on base for making their sorties.  the master sergeant of the unit came to me, and we worked out a way to make the sorties they needed.  we were making our sorties and then some!!!

then, the wing commander, a full bird colonel, came in to introduce himself, and to congratulate us on making our sorties, and what was the secret.  (he also at the time was the acting base commander.)  i hemmed and hawed at the request, making up stuff, so we wouldn't get in trouble. (the ms would k-ball parts off another units jet!  that's how we made our sorties!)  he would come in at least once every other week, to see how we were doing and stuff.  he would actually go into our supply room, and shot the breeze with me.

it was about the time that a ufo report documentary was being shown about the 1947 incident.  he came in one evening, and we went to the supply room, and a flight line mechanic was in there, i was going to ask him to leave and the commander said it was ok that he was there with me, and then he asked me if i believed in ufo's because of the documentary.  i said that i didn't know either way.  he then proceeded to tell us the following:

"in 1964, i was just an airman then, and we had a ufo land, and exchanged occupants, and other things."  he said he saw all this, and that if we ever told anyone, that he would deny it, and it would hurt his career. he also said to "never believe the government in regards to there being no ufo's, he said that they are real, and that the government doesn't want people to know."

i never even heard of a 1964 landing at that base, until years later, try until the internet!!!  then, just for the heck of it, i typed it in, and up it came!!!  i was stunned!!!
content.summary: Holloman afb ufo landing in 1964

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and her boyfriend stopped by the boyfriend's granparent's house in drumright on their way home from my house, so the boyfriend could run in and get something he had left there. while the boyfriend was inside my daughter was waiting in the car. she happened to notice an big bright orb in the sky that appeared to hover over the back of the grandparent's property in a wooded area. she had been to the house at night many times and had never seen this light before. she took a picture with her cell phone and sent it to me, along with the text "what is this?" i then called her to find out what she was talking about, and where she was, we spoke for a moment, then she said "whoa, this is weird! it's dropping something out of it!" i asked her if she could hear any sound from it and she said "no", i then told her she needed to get out of there immediately because i didn't know what it was or what it was dropping, but it instantly made me afraid for her safety! she said "ok, he is walking to the car now and we are leaving." so i told her to hurry up and not try to watch it as she drove, just get away from it, and she said ok. i hung up the phone and a minute or 2 later she sent me the second picture that she had taken before she left which does appear to have lights falling from it. the first picture was taken from the car. the second one she took standing by the car shooting the picture through a brushy tree in the yard.
i spoke to her the next day to get more details and she described it as a big bright round white light, it was low in the sky and didn't appear to be very far from the tops of the trees. it appeared to be on the property, not far away but she doesn't know exactly how far from her it was. she said she didn't hear any sound the whole time, and it never appeared to move but within a minute or two of her first seeing it, it started dropping more lights from it and the lights that were dropped appeared to go straight down behind the tree line. she was nervous when she saw it and when she saw the other lights come out she got scared and immediately left the area. when she last saw the orb it was still in the same spot and never moved before she drove away.
content.summary: Bright large orb hovering low in the sky then silently amitting more orbs over wooded area i got scared and drove away

content.detailedDescription:
it was late friday night & i was walking my dog. when i got back towards my house i was looking at a really big planet i thought was venus or mars, that was visible by the moon. i'm always watching the sky when i walk my dogs. i love the night sky & i'm always looking up... that's when i noticed what looked like little lights high up in the sky, that were circular/oval shaped, small & very star-like, were flying across the sky going from east-west & across the moon. i saw a few at first... & once those ones had gotten too far away to see anymore there would be other ones coming in from the other side. it started around 12:30 & went on until almost 3am... 

there was no one else outside in the neighborhood & my husband, who is a deep sleeper, would not wake up!! i tried to get pics & video from my old video camera & my phone, but the moon was too bright & the lights/crafts too dim.. i tried calling a bunch of people to see if anyone else could see what i saw because i wanted to tell someone & have someone else validate what i was seeing!! but no one else that i called could see anything from where they live. i actually called 911 & immediately felt stupid as i heard myself telling him what i was seeing... but he was really nice & he's the one who gave me the local ufo hotline number. i did end up filing a report with them right away. i left them a message & they called me back the next day. and then i tried calling a few other ufo hotlines, but they were all message services too. i did leave a message on one of the mufon lines, but didn't hear back... but i figured i should still make the report now since it's still pretty recent.

 so i couldn't get anyone on the phone who knew anything about this stuff & i was really frustrated...I couldnt explain it, so i just kept trying to talk myself out of it. i had no one to see it with me, so i tried to tell myself i must be wrong! thinking of what else i could be looking at & going over everything as i stared up still watching the crafts go by... in the end i couldn't deny what i saw anymore. part of what convinces me is how i felt it when i went to bed that night. i realized i was absolutely freezing. i was numb & i was shaking! it took at least 20-30 mins curled up under a ton of blankets before my body was warmed all the way through... i was looking at something strange outside that i obviously believed in, for me to stand outside for so long in the super cold weather, when i was right outside of my house & didn't go back inside for about 3 hours! until all the crafts had stopped coming... 

i've never seen anything like it in my life & i feel very strongly that what i saw was a fleet of about 30-50 star-like crafts traveling across the sky. they were steadily flying & didn't make turns or crazy maneuvers, but occasionally certain ones would speed up & "catch-up" to other crafts. most were all exactly the same size, but a few were slightly bigger & brighter. they were bright white, or bluish white like starlight. i think they might look this way to stay disguised as stars when they need/want to...

the night it happened, because i couldn't get any good pictures or videos, i started to write down everything as it happened. i'm so glad i did because now i can get any info i want & know that it's from the freshest memory of my experience since i wrote it in real time. that's how i'm able to give this account even weeks after it happened. even though it was a life changing event & i'm not likely to ever forget what i saw.

basic info:
sighting happened friday night 3/14/2014 (into 3/15/2014) from about 12:30am-3:00am. 
type of craft- light ball. looks like a star. size of regular stars. 
color- white, bluish.
speed- mostly a slower pace with some speeding to catch up sometimes.
how many- total fleet of about 30-50 or so. not at once, gradually across the sky.
direction- east to west. possibly sw.
where- vancouver, wa usa
content.summary: Witnessed a star-like fleet of ufo's in the night sky above my home, late night on friday march 14th, 2014.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving north when we noticed 3 glowing, orange orbs in the sky hovering above an intersection stop lights, one after another pulsating. we were not the only ones who see this, because when we slowed down so we're all the cars around us. as soon as we drove under the 3 objects and we're about 20 feet away we turned the car around to get a better look and by then were already gone. the whole event lasted maybe 3 mind from when we first noticed the lights.
content.summary: 3 orbs pulsating in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Was walking on  old dairy rd, short cut to store, my friend noticed something streight above us ( star like ) moveing about, he pointed and showed me, we thought that it was weard, started guessing what it wasen't, guessed of what it could be (ufo)we climbed up on hay stack, laid down and watched in wonder of all the things it was doing--ziped back in fourth long distances, made 90degree and more and less turns, would stop then go again, then about after 20 min's it just took a streight path and just dissaperd. we climbed down and finished walking to dairy store-- it looked shinny just like a star, never changed appearance (to high up) it gave us a good show, nothing else, and just left. we both new that no airplain could do what we had saw,something you will never forget.
content.summary: Layed down & watched on top of hay stak , it ziped back and fourth all directions 20 min then ziped away

content.detailedDescription: I don't know the date and/or year of the event since i was a young kid. throughout the years i have often thought of this event and i continue to often think about this event. in the early 1960's at night time my parents called my brother and me from bed, to come to the front window to see something unusual.  we both got to the picture window and observed a large bright red flaming object slowing coming from the direction from the left of the house directly down the street, approx. 15 feet above the street, toward the right side of the house at the same elevation going down the road to the right which is a dead end street of trees and past the trees is a lake and girl scout camp.  shortly afterwards we saw people in the street and then we saw police cars and fire trucks going down the road to the dead end.  they returned shortly there after without any sign of a fire or crash,  etc.  the ball was extremely bright and lite up the road and everything around it as it slowly went down the road.  in the morning my brother and cousins and i walked down the road looking for any signs of fire, etc., to the dead end.  we saw no signs of fire.  we walked into the trees/woods at the dead end and then to the lake/water walking what seemed endlessly in search for any signs of the bright fire ball, but we turned up nothing.  in the morning think i remember seeing a fire man looking for signs of anything along the road and i believe he said he did not find anything.  i think of this sighting very often, but i have never looked into the matter to determine if there were any reports from police and fire department ever dispatched along with other types of reports from people and i wonder if you have any information concerning this event.
content.summary: Bright reddish ball traveled straight line down street 15 ft above ground

content.detailedDescription:
Gliders or possibly drones have appeared high above the ground.  i can't but wonder how they got so high up.  they just hovered for the longest time.  probably weekend sports enthusiasts.  please look at my photos and tell me what you think they are.
i was on my pool deck reading.
i looked up and saw an unusual object, first i thought it might be a very large bird, but the wings never flapped.
it moved around slowly, mainly in a circling pattern like a buzzard.
i'm guessing it was several thousand feet up.
i just watched for minutes at a time to see what it would do.
i never lost sight, just got tired of watching.
in the past there have been only single objects at a time, always on weekends.  yesterday (4/5/14) there were multiple objects.  see photos. most, if not all of these photos were shot through the screen enclosure over my pool.
what's your guess as to what they are and what info you have on such things?
content.summary: Apparently they were gliders, but higher up than i believed possible.

content.detailedDescription: I always see planes flying in the distance from our house from north to south but at approximately 9pm april 5th, 2014 i noticed what i thought to be plane slowly moving from west to south at an odd speed and a back and forth direction no airplane can preform.  i thought it might have been a distant helicopter and went back to my show.  i then noticed a few minutes later the light was still in the same position off to my west but it was twinkling like a star.  i chalked it up to a breeze and the branches moving making the light look like it's twinkling.  but curiosity got the best of me and i then went outside to get a better look, where the air was calm with no breeze.  i do want to mention that i sense certain things about people or situations and as i fixated my eyes on the craft i had the thoughts yelling in my head to the craft 'get out of here, you don't belong here!' then an uneasy feeling came over me where my legs were getting weak and my heart was beating faster. there was a sense of this object not being a good thing.  the light was still off some distance in prince georges county but this was certainly no star or aircraft lights i had ever seen, and we see a lot around here with andrews air force base nearby.  there were 3 different lights i could make out, white, red and green.  and they weren't blinking like a plane does, but sporadically flashing accompanied by a pulsating light within the whole craft, which my husband also witnessed.  it was a crystal clear evening so i tried to get a better look with the binoculars but was unable to see it clearly as it may have been too far away. seeing the light left me with an uneasy feeling so i headed to bed and prayed for it to leave.  upon waking the next morning i reflected on the lights i saw and knew it was not of this world and made a mental note to take a photo or recording if it happened again.
content.summary: Noticed pulsating star in distance but upon further observation it was a hovering aircraft of some type

content.detailedDescription: Miraba el cielo y mire que habian unas esferas a lo lejos color rojo aparecian y desaparecian en un momento aparecieron mas de diez y formaron un triangulo despues desaperecieron la mayoria y como 5 quedaron ahi se movian muy rapido de un punto a otro.Puedo decir que no eran aviones o alguna maquin asi..Ya que los aviones se alcanza apercibir el ruido de sus turbinas..
content.summary: Eran como esferas de color rojiso formaban un triangulo se movian rapido aparecian y desaperecian

content.detailedDescription: While traveling north on i-57 at 11:16pm on saturday, april 5, 2014, my wife initially spotted a descending bright object off the front, right of our car.  that would place it north and east of our position.  she exclaimed "do you see this!" and i looked toward her side of the windshield seeing the quickly descending object.  it appeared to be a spherical shape with the bottom brightly lit in a bluish-white light.  not a beam but bright like the moon (which was seen clearly toward the west-southwest of our position).  the object appeared to descend straight down behind a tree line where we lost visual contact.  the total duration of my sighting was perhaps 2-3 seconds and my wife observed it perhaps a second or so more.  we were so astonished we immediately called my brothers who were also traveling (but in missouri) and told them of the sighting.  this was one of the best unexplained contacts i have ever had as the night was crystal clear with unlimited visibility.  temperature was about 43deg.  we discussed options as to what it may have been, but can only conclude it is not explainable by the usual air vehicles.  i am a retired us air force officer with years of observing military aircraft.
content.summary: Decending bright light near il i-57 & i-64.  light appeared to be the bottom of object.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Riding in moms car to my brothers house for dinner when i thought i spotted a shooting star until i realized it was much too large to be a star. i shouted, "what's that!" we both saw this object but she was driving so i had the ability to watch it the whole time. 
the bright fluoresce-lighted triangular shaped object flew across the sky, stopped and hovered then took off in another direction and disappeared. it was as high as a helicopter would be but without any sound, wings or propellers. it was unlike anything i've ever seen before. my heart skipped a beat and i totally freaked out. unfortunately it happened way to fast to get a picture. i was fumbling for my phone but it was gone by the time i got it.
just crazy and amazing!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a bright fluorescent triangular object go across the sky, hover then took off in different direction

content.detailedDescription: Son was riding bike out front of our house...    saw this disk shaped domed silent metallic object come in low from the west, descending, and stop (hovering) about 10 feet off the ground in a grassy field across the road  for about 5 or 6 seconds, then continue on it's path to the east.  total sight time was about 10 seconds.     this sighting was totally out of the blue, unprovoked, and my son is not given to making up stories..   he's a very smart little boy. drew picture of the same thing twice..  identical.  i believe him.    disk shaped object about 12 feet in diameter.. metallic, reflective..  had a single row of lights around the perimeter..   they were lit..All white light.   they blinked sequentially.  it was making no noise.  there were power lines in the background, but, they were parallel to the path and were not obstructive.     he was frightened by it.   it was sudden and he has never seen anything like that before in person.   came in slow and accelerated insanely fast. he could hear no wind coming off it..   from the description, it sounds like nothing i can pin to any known aircraft.   drones dont even move that quick.    sky is overcast today.   this happened about 2 hours ago.
content.summary: Son was riding bike..  saw this thing.   drew picture of it twice..  identical.

content.detailedDescription:
Genre de forme dun t rond qui vole sur le plat
de couleur or ou nickel semi sale
pas un son, vole en ligne droite

jetais dehors avec mon chien dans ma cours les 2 fois en 1 ans
content.summary: Fais 2 fois je vois cela

content.detailedDescription:
Viewed from meaford, ontario, canada. 10pm -5 est time, april 5, 2014.

written on smart phone, please disregard structure and spelling.

description of whole event

taking dog outside to pee. look up towards west/north west. notice that there is a satalite crossing through the sky. i decide to keep watching it.

it has the exact same appearance and traits as a common satalite, or at least until it started to slow down. 

long slow arc across visible sky, slowing as it approched a point in the west/ southwest. it reached this point an stopped. took about 45 seconds to reach this point from when i first saw it.

after stopping it began a slow accellerating path at a 90�� angle "downwards". it continued this path for 1 thumb width, then made an instant 90�� change in direction to the "right". it did a slow accel about 1 more thumb width. it came to a halt. it hovered there for maybe 10 seconds. after this is began another 90�� turn "downwards" and performed a snake pattern over 2 thumb widths - demonstrating variance in speed, and amplitude of the wave pattern. 

after this snake pattern it stopped, hovered, then faded away over 15 seconds.

i was sober, and not even looking for it. i have my roommate as a witness to the last 15 seconds.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: White orb craft, demonstrated long arc, slowing, stopping, 3 x 90° angles, snake wobble, slow fade to dissapear

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On the nights of 4/3/14, 4/4/14, 4/5/14 al(a former mayor) have been observing unusual activity off of hwy53 in watinsville. i asked my friend al to accompany me, i needed another witness and what we have discovered is unbelievable! we took photos(on tripod)of over 100 ufos over the last 3 days!We observed pulsating multi-colored lights over the tree tops and saw thru the binoculars a disc object stationary it was then joined by another then another,they seperated and slowly(like a plane) moved away from each other.We saw this multiple times and captured some unusual photos that i will send you today! we saw a flash close to us and then took a photo, what we saw will stun you! they shot beams of light toward the ground and towards other ufos. we saw(photo) a large ufo and smaller ones coming out of it! when a plane would come by they would blink out then reappear. we never heard a sound but we saw more than we could have imagined! there was more than we could see with the naked eye, the camera captured what we could not. i have been investigating ufos in my area for over 5 years and have never seen the high volume of ufos as we did last night! normally i am excited when i see something odd in our air space however last night i found my self feeling really scared! i can't believe that many ufos are here and that the military,police or civilians have not noticed them? we have and i will show you the proof! lets hope their friendly...They remained in the cloudy sky but we had to go home. we lost sight of them because we had to leave, we will be back out tonight and i will let you know what we find!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Mass sighting in watkinsville for 3 nights

content.detailedDescription:
Around 11:30 pm last night i was gazing out the south facing window.

all of a sudden, something (a ufo) flew west to east at great speed.

i have very large double windows. at least 3 feet wide, maybe a little larger.

i have seen planes and aero-med fly by the window before, when they do i can track them for several seconds as they pass by.

also i can hear them.

this thing traversed the span of my window in less than 2 seconds.

there was a blue light on the top a red one below and there was a diminished white light in the middle (in a sort of oval shape).

it made absolutely no sound.

i got up to look out the window to see if i could make out where it was going and it was gone. no, it didn't fly over the house or anywhere in the direction of the hospital, it was on a straight line east like toward ada.

and, again, it made no sound.
content.summary: Light - oval

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at a stoplight at the intersection of 36th and patterson facing west when i saw a gray spherical object high above the horizon. at first i thought it was a helium balloon or something except it didn't move. as i watched it turned black like it was being eclipsed by something then completely vanished. "the size in relative terms was about the size of a #2 pencil eraser held at arms length. and when i described it being eclipsed it wasn't because of another object. it looked like a total eclipse of the sun, but you could only see the shadow. maybe it was turning, i'm not sure, it was very small from my vantage point. it was the blackest black i'd ever seen, it looked like the period at the end of a sentence floating in mid air. to go from a gray (silver gray) object to total black was weird. i thought for sure others must have seen it too. and when i said it vanished, it did exactly that, vanished, it didn't accelerate in any particular direction. it was just gone. reminded me of the dot you used to see on the old black and white tv sets when you turned them off, just blinked out. this happened around four o'clock in the afternoon, i was making my way home from work. although the gerald r. ford airport is less than a mile from where i was. it wasn't any kind of aircraft i'd ever seen before. the weather that day was sunshine and blue skies, that's why it stood out so much. air temperature in the mid eighties.
 
that's all the information i can give. please feel free to use any / all of this additional information to elaborate on my submission as you see fit.
content.summary: Circular object

content.detailedDescription: It was a clear night, a friend and i were standing in my backyard when i looked up into the sky and saw a large floating dark triangle moving slowly across the sky from west to east. object made no sound and no lights were present. we could make out the shape as it blotted out the stars behind it. we both just stood there and watched in disbelief as it floated off and was obscured by trees.
content.summary: Dark, black triangle craft

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard at about 8:45 p.M. putting the dog out. i was looking up at the stars as i like to do and saw a reddish orange light in the western sky that was about three times larger than the north star. it seemed to be pulsating as i could see a glowing like effect from the sides. i looked at it for about 45 seconds to try to figure out what it was then went to get my husband but he had gone back upstairs. i went back outside and the light was still there for about another fifteen to twenty seconds then it started to get smaller very rapidly and went out completely without appearing to move. there were planes in the skies all around but nothing that looked even close in nature to the object. the light appeared to be closer than the stars in the skies.
content.summary: Large reddish orange light, seemed lower than the stars. got smaller rapidly then disappeared without seeming to move.

content.detailedDescription: It was predawn and i had just awoken to start my day. i went outside to smoke a cig when i noticed a star like object that appeared to be close to earth with flashing lights of red and blue. i thought it was a helicopter just paused in the sky. i called my honey to come look at it. he asked me to get the binoculars. he looked at and saw a round object that to him appeared to be moving slightly back and forth while remaining in the same place. i looked in binoculars and saw a round capsule fuzzy object that appeared to be vertical with a titling motion right & left, kind of rocking back and forth. i was still not able to clearly see what it was. i went to get the cell phone camera and zoomed in on the star like object and took a few pix. my honey watched it with the binoculars. the sun had risen more and the sky was beginning to lighten. just when the sky was fully lit with daylight an airplane was coming to land at the local airport. we watched as the plane appeared to pass right underneath it with no visible reaction. as we commented to each other wow, the plane did not seem to see that, the airplane had like a warping happening, like the back end of the airplane was fishtailing. we could clearing see this, but could tell by the planes continuation that it did not appear to have actually affected the plane. that was wild! as the sun lit up the sky more, it seemed to lighten the object, like white sunlight was reflecting on it. there were no more flashing lights. we observed it for a few more minutes and then it began moving at a slow steady pace, at same altitude, away from us, seeming to rise slightly as it moved away, then it just faded away like it had gone too far for us to see any longer. it was exciting at first to wonder what it was. my honey ushered us into the house and locked the door behind us. he was in shock about it all like i was. i hooked up the computer and downloaded the pix off my cell phone. the pix are what made me become disturbed. some of the pix were taken one after the other and in them, the object is in a different direction each time. one pix specifically the item is not a star like object at all, but when i was taking the pix it never changed shape that i could tell,  and when i enlarged the pix there was a round object with shadows and spaces that was not what i had seen while taking the pix. we were both a bit freaked out then; i began to shake and felt sick to my stomach. i posted the creepy pix to my fb and basically said this is what i saw this morning, don't know what it is but there you have it. we didn't discuss it after that and did not speak with anyone about it. we have not discussed it again until now while i am writing this. the warping or fishtailing of the airplane still strikes us as bizarre. we find ourselves watching the sky and reading ufo articles now which we never did before. a few weeks later i captured another photo of a thick, dark, oblong appeared to be a cloud object floating over a different part of the city. i'll submit that photo in another recap.
content.summary: Object in the predawn & dawn sky - airplane appeared to fishtail when passing it, pix item not what eye saw

content.detailedDescription: I was working at a remote oil camp exploration roughly 82 miles north of my community and 50 km off the highway.  one evening after checking the calendar, it was around august 10/09, me and a co-worker from camp who is now a very good friend of mine decided to go to a nearby lake which was used as a float plane landing lake before camp was setup, but anyway there was a bridge set up as a t shape.  we sat on the bridge while listening to music from my phone and talking.  i was sitting facing the south and my friend was sitting two feet to my right and she was facing north.  we kept talking for a while, until i shifted to my left and looked over the lake, it was a nice evening and while we were chatting, i moved my head over to my left and noticed an object above the treeline across the small lake and there was no sound from it.  it was a circular shape on the bottom and sort of coned up to the top, in the middle section was an orange/red color light, it wasn't bright but there was a middle panel of it.  on the bottom part of the object was a bright white light that moved in a circular motion that lit up the treetop and onto the ground and water.  it would be like if you held a flashlight and moved your wrist in a circular motion, you'd see the light going in circle.  this object moved slowly along the shoreline and slowly moved back above the trees and slowly moved behind the treeline and was it gone, few minutes later it slowly came back out and moved very slowly along shore line across the small lake and it kept moving slowly and we were at awe and my friend at that time was scared and ran back to the truck.  i still stood on the bridge and kept watching this object, my friend at that time was honking the horn so we could leave cause this object was getting closer to where we were.  i still stood there and as the object kept moving slowly along the shoreline, it was getting brighter as it was getting closer, but it was still on the other side of the lake and by that time, my friend kept honking the horn and i felt like i should leave as we do not know what it was and i should keep my friend safe as well, so i went back to the truck and we left back to the camp which was a couple of minutes away.  after calming my friend down, i went back to my room, i wanted to go back to the lake but i didn't. i now regret not going back cause whatever it was, i wanted to know what it was or what i could even pick up from observing it, but overall it was an interesting thing to witness.  i just attached a picture using google earth, triangle was where we were and the star is where we saw the object and it moved behind the trees with the red drawing and came back pretty much along the same area and slowly moved along to the right where there is a beach which i always wanted to go to, but around that area is when that object was until we left.
content.summary: Circular with circular rotation bright light underneath with red/orange light mid section

content.detailedDescription: I was 9 or 10 yrs. old, so 1964,65. warm summer day about 9pm. i was at the end of my street and decided to lay down in a neibours nice cool grass with my hands under my head. i couldn't believe all the stars out that night. the sky was full of them. as i looked around at all these stars i noticed one way over to my left moving across the sky to my right.(these just looked like other stars). it wasn't moving fast, like it didn't want to be noticed.It continued heading right until it got over to my right then went in between two others which also looked like stars. it got a little ways past them and then they began to follow it. triangle formation. they went a little further then stopped and sat there for several min. finally they moved again, about a 45 degree angle to the right for a short distance then stopped again for several min.(the angle was down). then the one in front went back between the other two going r to l and again they followed for a short distance then stopped again. then they moved down on another angle and stopped again.Each time they would move they would sit for several min. they moved again from l to r but didn't change places this time. they moved again down on an angle and sat there. i didn't have any idea what i was looking at and i didn't really care. what ever they were doing up there they must have been done because they left in a hurry. they went from the right side of the sky to the left in 1 sec. then made a 90 degree turn and shot up into space and were gone in less than a blink of an eye. i just got up to walk home and thought to myself, gee, there are other beings living in the universe, how cool. there is more to this story, things that happened later in my life that i still don't understand. but i know we're not alone and there technology is far more advanced than anything we'll ever have. thanks for this website. hope to hear from you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: First one then three made several moves stopping for several min. after each move. then left in hurry.
